title: Sell Dom Pérignon
metaTitle: Sell Dom Perignon Champagne | P2, P3, Luminous | Proof Cellars
metaDescription: Sell your Dom Pérignon Champagne. We buy Vintage, Rosé, P2 (Plénitude 2), P3, and Luminous editions. Direct offers.
heroSubhead: We buy Dom Pérignon Vintage, Rosé, and Plénitude releases.
introParagraph: Dom Pérignon is the most famous prestige cuvée in the world, produced by Moët & Chandon only in vintage years. We are active buyers of all Dom Pérignon releases, including the standard Vintage, Rosé, the late-disgorged Plénitude series (P2 and P3), and the Luminous editions popular in nightlife.
whatWeBuy: Dom Pérignon Oenothèque (older designation for P2/P3)
Dom Pérignon Lady Gaga / Lenny Kravitz Editions
conditionFactors: Foil integrity (foil damage is common and reduces value)
pricingFactors: Luminous feature (working light adds small premium)
Special collaborations (Lady Gaga, Jeff Koons etc.)

faqs.question: What is P2 and P3?
faqs.answer: These are 'Plénitude' releases aged longer on the lees. P2 is aged ~15 years, P3 ~25 years. They are significantly more valuable than the standard vintage.

faqs.question: Do you buy Luminous bottles?
faqs.answer: Yes, we buy Luminous bottles. Ideally the light should still work, but we buy them regardless.

faqs.question: Is the 2008 vintage special?
faqs.answer: Yes, 2008 is considered one of the greatest Champagne vintages in history.

faqs.question: Do you buy the Rosé?
faqs.answer: Yes, Dom Pérignon Rosé is highly collectible and more expensive than the Blanc.

faqs.question: Do I need the box?
faqs.answer: For standard vintages, the box is helpful but not mandatory. For P2, P3, and special editions, the box is very important for value.

faqs.question: Do you buy older vintages?
faqs.answer: Yes, we look for well-stored bottles from the 60s, 70s, 80s, and 90s.
